actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Earths Embrace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Large or smaller creature. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage  and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends  the elemental can't burrow or use Earths Embrace and its slam attacks are made with advantage against the grappled target.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Earth Glide
special_abilities.desc: The elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone without disturbing it.

special_abilities.name: Siege Monster
special_abilities.desc: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures.

special_abilities.name: Elemental Nature
special_abilities.desc: An elemental doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.
